mapper.insert: insert into tl_school_parent (parent_id, student_ID, parentname, sex, profession, income, age, taglib, create_time, adress) values (#{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{income,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taglib,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{adress,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tl_school_parent set student_ID = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parentname = #{parentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profession = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, income = #{income,jdbcType=INTEGER}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, taglib = #{taglib,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, adress = #{adress,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select parent_id, student_ID, parentname, sex, profession, income, age, taglib, create_time, adress from tl_school_parent where parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select parent_id, student_ID, parentname, sex, profession, income, age, taglib, create_time, adress from tl_school_parent
